content: this pattern is for a herringbone phone cover the herringbone stitch is a simple modification of a half_double_crochet which makes the phone cover very textured and sturdy enough for a protective case the pattern is easily adjustable for every type of phone out there the pattern is easy to follow with written and photo instructions also for beginner crocheters all you need is a 3 5 mm crochet needle and 4 shades of the same colour
